name: bfcache_no_store

scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy bfcache_no_store --gen2 --runtime nodejs22 --trigger-http --region us-central1 --entry-point bfcache_no_store_function_name --source . --allow-unauthenticated

description: A demo of a cache-control: no-store page used to test upcoming bfcache changes
